name: Game Maker 8.1 Project File
summary: Learn about .GM81 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Once development is complete, GameMaker projects can be built into a standard Windows executable (.EXE) file.
NOTE: GM81 files can only be opened and edited with GameMaker 8.1. Previous versions of GameMaker use the .GM6 and .GMK extensions.

description: Project file created by GameMaker, a video game development application that enables games to be created using drag-and-drop actions; may include source code as well as references to game resources, such as graphics, sound effects, and music.
